name: WineEnthusiast
0:
”Alexa, open Wine Enthusiast”
”Alexa, launch Wine Enthusiast”
”Alexa, start Wine Enthusiast”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wine enthusiast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Wine Enthusiast skill expertly pairs wines from around the world with a diverse array of cuisines and dishes. Created by the leading wine lifestyle publication, Wine Enthusiast, you’ll know that the pairings and recommendations you’ll receive are always perfectly on-point. 

After downloading the Wine Enthusiast skill launch the skill by saying “Alexa, open Wine Enthusiast.” Then ask Alexa for a pairing by saying “Alexa, ask Wine Enthusiast what wine goes with Chicken Marsala.” or “ Alexa, ask Wine Enthusiast to pair a wine with Chicken Marsala." and you’ll receive an ideal pairing wine for the dish. To get another recommendation for the same dish, just say “Alexa, tell me another.”

The Wine Enthusiast skill will also provide step-by-step recipes pulled right from pages of the magazine and sent directly to your Alexa app. 

Get the Wine Enthusiast skill and start enjoying world-class wine- and food pairings tonight!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
